title: Crescent-Topped Casserole
steps: In a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in tomato sauce and spaghetti sauce mix. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat; stir in sour cream. Spoon into a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.

Unroll crescent dough into one rectangle; seal seams and perforations. Place over cheese. brush with butter and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
